XXbsu014_u:252: so 'syāṃ pramuditāyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau sthitaḥ san imānyevaṃrūpāṇi mahāpraṇidhānāni mahāvyavasāyān mahābhinirhārānabhinirharati - yaduta aśeṣaniḥśeṣānavaśeṣasarvabuddhapūjopasthāpanāya sarvākāravaropetamudārādhimuktiviśuddhaṃ dharmadhātuvipulamākāśadhātuparyavasānamaparāntakoṭiniṣṭhaṃ (Dbh 10)

XXbsu014_u:269: yaduta avivartyacakrasamārūḍhabodhisattvacaryācaraṇāya amoghakāyavāṅmanaskarmaṇe sahadarśananiyatabuddhadharmatvāya sahaghoṣodāhārajñānānugamāya sahaprasādakleśavinivartanāya mahābhaiṣajyarājopamāśrayapratilambhāya cintāmaṇivatkāyapratilambhāya sarvabodhisattvacaryācaraṇāya ... caryā ...
XXbsu014_u:273: iti hi bhavanto jinaputrā imānyevaṃrūpāṇi mahāpraṇidhānāni mahāvyavasāyān mahābhinirhārān daśa praṇidhānamukhāni pramukhaṃ kṛtvā paripūrṇāni daśapraṇidhānāsaṃkhyeyaśatasahasrāṇi yāni bodhisattvaḥ pramuditāyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau sthito 'bhinirharati pratilabhate ca //
XXbsu014_u:275: katamairdaśabhiḥ? yaduta sattvadhātuniṣṭhayā ca lokadhātuniṣṭhayā ca ākāśadhātuniṣṭhayā ca dharmadhātuniṣṭhayā ca nirvāṇadhātuniṣṭhayā ca
XXbsu014_u:276: buddhotpādadhātuniṣṭhayā ca tathāgatajñānadhātuniṣṭhayā ca cittālambanadhātuniṣṭhayā ca buddhaviṣayajñānapraveśadhātuniṣṭhayāḥ ca lokavartanīdharmavartanījñānavartanīdhātuniṣṭhayā ca /
XXbsu014_u:278: sattvadhātuniṣṭhāyāḥ, sā me niṣṭhā eṣāṃ mahāpraṇidhānānāṃ bhavatu /
XXbsu014_u:279: yā niṣṭhā yāvajjñānavartanīdhātuniṣṭhāyāḥ, sā me niṣṭhā eṣāṃ mahāpraṇidhānānāṃ bhavatu /
XXbsu014_u:286: so 'bhiśraddadhāti tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ pūrvāntacaryābhinirhārapraveśaṃ pāramitāsamudāgamaṃ bhūmipariniṣpattiṃ
XXbsu014_u:287: vaiśeṣikatāṃ balapariniṣpattiṃ vaiśāradyaparipūrimāveṇikabuddhadharmāsaṃhāryatāmacintyāṃ buddhadharmatāmanantamadhyaṃ tathāgataviṣayābhinirhāramaparimāṇajñānānugataṃ tathāgatagocarānupraveśaṃ phalapariniṣpattimabhiśraddadhāti samāsataḥ sarvabodhisattvacaryāṃ yāvattathāgatabhūmijñānanirdeśādhiṣṭhānamabhiśraddadhāti
XXbsu014_u:288: tasyaivaṃ bhavati - evaṃ gambhīrāḥ khalu punarime buddhadharmāḥ evaṃ
XXbsu014_u:289: viviktāḥ evaṃ śāntāḥ evaṃ śūnyāḥ evamānimittāḥ evamapraṇihitāḥ evaṃ nirupalepāḥ evaṃ vipulāḥ evamaparimāṇāḥ evamudārāḥ evaṃ durāsadāśceme buddhadharmāḥ /
XXbsu014_u:290: atha ca punarime bālapṛthagjanāḥ kudṛṣṭipatitayā saṃtatyā avidyāndhakāraparyavanaddhamānasena mānadhvajasamucchritaiḥ saṃkalpaistṛṣṇājālābhilaṣitairmanasikārairmāyāśāṭhyagahanānucaritaiścittāśayairīrṣyāmātsaryasaṃprayuktairgatyupapattiprayogai rāgadveṣamohaparicitaiḥ karmopacayaiḥ krodhopanāhasaṃdhukṣitābhiścittajvālābhirviparyāsasaṃprayuktaiḥ karmakriyābhinirhāraiḥ kāmabhavāvidyāsravānubaddhaiścittamanovijñānabījaistraidhātuke punarbhavāṅkuramabhinirvartayanti yadidaṃ nāmarūpasahajāvinirbhāgagatam /
XXbsu014_u:291: tenaiva ca nāmarūpeṇa vivardhitena eṣāṃ ṣaḍāyatanagrāmaḥ saṃbhavati /
XXbsu014_u:293: tāmeva vedanāṃ bhūyo bhūyo 'bhinandatāṃ tṛṣṇopādānaṃ vivardhate /
XXbsu014_u:296: evameteṣāṃ sattvānāṃ duḥkhaskandho 'bhinirvartate ātmātmīyavigato riktastucchaḥ śūnyo nirīho niśceṣṭo jaḍastṛṇakāṣṭhakuḍyavartmapratibhāsopamaḥ /
XXbsu014_u:298: teṣāmevaṃrūpeṇa sattvānāṃ duḥkhaskandhāvipramokṣaṃ dṛṣṭvā sattveṣu mahākaruṇonmiñjaḥ saṃbhavati - ete 'smābhiḥ sattvāḥ paritrātavyāḥ parimocayitavyā (Dbh 12) ato mahāsaṃmohāt, atyantasukhe ca nirvāṇe
XXbsu014_u:301: evaṃ kṛpāmaitryanugatena khalu punarbhavanto jinaputrā bodhisattvo
XXbsu014_u:302: 'dhyāśayena prathamāyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau vartamānaḥ sarvavastuṣu sāpekṣacittaṃ parivarjya buddhajñāne ca udāraspṛhābhilāṣabuddhirmahātyāgeṣu prayuñjate /
XXbsu014_u:303: sa ya ime tyāgāḥ - yaduta dhanadhānyakośakoṣṭhāgāraparityāgo vā
XXbsu014_u:304: hiraṇyasuvarṇamaṇimuktāvaiḍūryaśaṅkhaśilāpravālajātarūparajataparityāgo vā ratnābharaṇavibhūṣaṇaparityāgo vā hayarathagajapativāhanaparityāgo vā udyānatapovanavihāraparityāgo vā dāsīdāsakarmakarapauruṣeyaparityāgo vā grāmanagaranigamajanapadarāṣṭrarājadhānīparityāgo vā bhāryāputraduhitṛparityāgo vā sarvapriyamanāpavastuparityāgo vā śiraḥkarṇanāsākaracaraṇanayanasvamāṃsaśoṇitāsthimajjāmedaśchavicarmahṛdayasarvātmabhāvaparityāgo vā, teṣvanapekṣo bhūtvā sarvavastuṣu buddhajñāne ca udāraspṛhābhilāṣabuddhiḥ parityajati evaṃ hyasya prathamāyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau sthitasya mahātyāgaḥ saṃbhavati //
XXbsu014_u:305: sa evaṃ karuṇāmaitrītyāgāśayo bhūtvā sarvasattvaparitrāṇārthaṃ bhūyo bhūyo laukikalokottarānarthān parimārgate parigaveṣate /
XXbsu014_u:311: sa evaṃ śāstropetaḥ kriyākriyāvicāritayā buddhyā hīnamadhyapraṇīteṣu sattveṣu tathatvāya pratipadyate yathābalaṃ yathābhajamānam /
XXbsu014_u:313: lokajñaśca kālavelāmātracārī hryapatrāpyavibhūṣitayā saṃtatyā ātmārthaparārtheṣu prayujyate
XXbsu014_u:315: teṣu ca prayogeṣu naiṣkramyacārī avivartyāpratyudāvartyabalādhānaprāpto bhavati /
XXbsu014_u:317: dhṛtibalādhānaprāptaśca tathāgatapūjopasthāneṣu prayujyate, śāsane ca pratipadyate /
XXbsu014_u:318: evaṃ hyasyeme daśa bhūmipariśodhakā dharmā ājātā bhavanti /
XXbsu014_u:319: tadyathā - śraddhā karuṇā maitrī tyāgaḥ khedasahiṣṇutā śāstrajñatā lokajñatā hryapatrāpyaṃ
XXbsu014_u:321: tasya asyāṃ pramuditāyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau sthitasya bodhisattvasya bahavo buddhā ābhāsamāgacchanti audārikadarśanena praṇidhānabalena ca /
XXbsu014_u:322: bahūni buddhaśatāni bahūni buddhasahasrāṇi bahūni buddhaśatasahasrāṇi bahūni buddhanayutaśatasahasrāṇi bahavo buddhakoṭyo bahūni buddhakoṭīśatāni bahūni buddhakoṭīsahasrāṇi bahūni buddhakoṭīśatasahasrāṇi bahūni buddhakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇyābhāsamāgacchanti audārikadarśanena praṇidhānabalena ca /

XXbsu014_u:328: tāṃśca asya buddhān bhagavataḥ pūjayataḥ sattvaparipāka ājāto bhavati /

XXbsu014_u:330: asyopari dve arthasaṃgrahavastūnyājāyete na tu khalvaśeṣajñānaprativedhapratilambhena /

XXbsu014_u:332: sa yathā yathā buddhāṃśca bhagavataḥ pūjayati, sattvaparipākāya ca prayujya tānimān daśa bhūmipariśodhakān dharmān samādāya vartate, tathā tathāsya tāni
XXbsu014_u:335: tadyathāpi nāma bhavanto jinaputrā jātarūpaṃ kuśalena karmāreṇa yathā yathāgnau
XXbsu014_u:336: prakṣipyate, tathā tathā pariśuddhyati karmaṇyaṃ ca bhavati
XXbsu014_u:337: vibhūṣaṇālaṃkāravidhiṣu yathākāmatayā, evameva bhavanto jinaputrā yathā yathā bodhisattvo ... peyālaṃ ... yathākāmatayā //
XXbsu014_u:338: punaraparaṃ bhavanto jinaputra bodhisattvena asyāṃ prathamāyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau sthitena asyā eva prathamāyā bodhisattvabhūmerākārapratilambhaniṣyandāḥ parimārgitavyāḥ parigaveṣitavyāḥ paripraṣṭavyāḥ /
XXbsu014_u:339: buddhabodhisattvānāṃ kalyāṇamitrāṇāṃ ca sakāśādatṛptena ca bhavitavyaṃ bhūmyaṅgapariniṣpādanāya
XXbsu014_u:341: tena bhūmipakṣapratipakṣakuśalena ca bhavitavyaṃ bhūmisaṃvartavivartakuśalena ca bhūmyākāraniṣyandakuśalena ca bhūmipratilambhavibhāvanākuśalena ca bhūmyaṅgapariśodhanakuśalena ca bhūmerbhūmisaṃkramaṇakuśalena ca bhūmibhūmivyavasthānakuśalena ca bhūmibhūmiviśeṣajñānakuśalena ca bhūmibhūmipratilambhāpratyudāvartyakuśalena ca sarvabodhisattvabhūmipariśodhanatayā tathāgatajñānabhūmyākramaṇakuśalena ca bhavitavyam evaṃ bhūmyākārābhinirhārakuśalasya hi bhavanto jinaputrā bodhisattvasya prathamāyā bodhisattvabhūmerucchalitasya niṣṭhānaṃ na saṃbhavati yāvaddaśabhūmibhūmyākramaṇamiti /
XXbsu014_u:342: mārgādhiṣṭhānāgamena ca bhūmejñānālokena ca buddhajñānālokaṃ prāpnoti /
XXbsu014_u:343: tadyathāpi nāma bhavanto jinaputrāḥ kuśalaḥ sārthavāho mahāsārthaparikarṣaṇābhiprāyo mahānagaramanuprāpayitukāmaḥ ādāveva mārgaguṇāṃśca mārgavivartadoṣāṃśca mārgasthānāntaraviśeṣāṃśca mārgasthānāntaravivartadoṣāṃśca mārgakriyāpathyodanakāryatāṃ ca parimārgayati parigaveṣayate /

XXbsu014_u:345: sa evaṃ jñānavicāritayā buddhyā mahāpathyodanasamṛddhyā anupūrveṇa mahāsārthena sārdhaṃ yāvanmahānagaramanuprāpnoti, na cāṭavīkāntāradoṣaiḥ sārthasya vā ātmano vāsyopaghātaḥ saṃpadyate /
XXbsu014_u:346: evameva bhavanto jinaputrā bodhisattvaḥ kuśalo mahāsārthavāho yadā prathamāyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau sthito bhavati, tadā bhūmipakṣapratipakṣakuśalo bhavati, bhūmisaṃvartavivartakuśalo bhavati,
XXbsu014_u:353: jñānasaṃbhārasukṛtavicayo mahāsattvasārthaparikarṣaṇābhiprāyaḥ sarvajñatāmahānagaramanuprāpayitukāmaḥ ādāveva bhūmimārgaguṇāṃśca bhūmimārgavivartadoṣāṃśca bhūmimārgasthānāntaraviśeṣāṃśca bhūmimārgasthānāntaravivartadoṣāṃśca mahāpuṇyajñānasaṃbhārapathyadanakriyākāryatāṃ ca parimārgate parigaveṣate buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ kalyāṇamitrāṇāṃ ca sakāśāt /
XXbsu014_u:355: sa evaṃ jñānavicāritayā buddhyā mahāpuṇyajñānasaṃbhārapathyadanasaṃruddhayā mahāntaṃ sattvasārthaṃ yathāparipācitaṃ saṃsārāṭavīkāntāradurgādatikramya yāvatsarvajñatāmahānagaramanuprāpayati na saṃsāraṭavīkāntāradoṣaiḥ sattvasārthasya vā ātmano vā asyopaghātaḥ saṃpadyate /
XXbsu014_u:356: tasmāttarhi bhavanto jinaputrā bodhisattvena aparikhinnena bhūmiparikarmaparikarmaviśeṣābhiyuktena bhavitavyam /
XXbsu014_u:357: ayaṃ bhavanto jinaputrā bodhisattvasya prathamāyāḥ pramuditāyā bodhisattvabhūmermukhapraveśaḥ samāsato nirdiśyate //
XXbsu014_u:358: yo 'syāṃ pratiṣṭhito bodhisattvo bhūyastvena jambūdvīpeśvaro bhavati mahaiśvaryādhipatyapratilabdho dharmānurakṣī kṛtī prabhuḥ sattvān mahātyāgena saṃgrahītukuśalaḥ sattvānāṃ mātsaryamalavinivṛttaye 'paryanto
XXbsu014_u:360: yacca kiṃcitkarmārabhate dānena vā priyavadyatayā vā arthakriyayā vā samānārthatayā vā, tatsarvamavirahitaṃ buddhamanasikārairdharmamanasikāraiḥ saṃghamanasikārairbodhisattvamanasikārairbodhisattvacaryāmanasikāraiḥ pāramitāmanasikārairbhūmimanasikārairbalamanasikārairvaiśāradyamanasikārairāveṇikabuddhadharmamanasikārairyāvatsarvākāravaropetasarvajñajñānamanasikaraiḥ kimiti? sarvasattvānāmagryo bhaveyaṃ śreṣṭho jyeṣṭho varaḥ pravara
XXbsu014_u:361: uttamo 'nuttamo nāyako vināyakaḥ pariṇāyako yāvatsarvajñajñānapratiśaraṇo bhaveyam iti /

XXbsu014_u:363: pravrajitaśca san ekakṣaṇalavamuhūrtena samādhiśataṃ ca pratilabhate samāpadyate ca /
XXbsu014_u:364: buddhaśataṃ ca paśyati, teṣāṃ cādhiṣṭhānaṃ saṃjānīte /
XXbsu014_u:374: tathā uttare praṇidhānabalikā bodhisattvāḥ praṇidhānaviśeṣikatayā vikurvanti yeṣāṃ na sukarā saṃkhyā kurtuṃ kāyasya vā prabhāyā vā ṛdvervā cakṣuṣo vā gocarasya vā svarasya vā caryāyā vā vyūhasya vā adhiṣṭhānasya vā adhimuktervā abhisaṃskāraṇāṃ vā yāvadevatāvadbhirapi kalpakoṭiniyutaśatasahasrairiti pramuditā nāma prathamā bhūmiḥ //
XXbsu014_u:377: vajragarbho bodhisattva āha - yo 'yaṃ bhavanto jinaputrā bodhisattvaḥ
XXbsu014_u:381: daśa? yaduta ṛjvāśayatā ca mṛdvāśayatā ca karmaṇyāśayatā ca damāśayatā ca

XXbsu014_u:385: tatra bhavanto jinaputrā vimalāyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau sthito bodhisattvaḥ prakṛtyaiva daśabhiḥ kuśalaiḥ karmapathaiḥ samanvāgato bhavati /
XXbsu014_u:387: nihatadaṇḍo nihataśastro nihatavairo lajjāvān dayāpannaḥ sarvaprāṇibhūteṣu hitasukhānukampī maitracittaḥ /

XXbsu014_u:393: sa paraparigṛhītāsu strīṣu parabhāryāsu gotradhvajadharmarakṣitāsu abhidhyāmapi notpādayati, kaḥ punarvādo dvīndriyasamāpatyā vā anaṅgavijñaptyā vā //
XXbsu014_u:394: anṛtavacanātprativirataḥ khalu punarbhavati satyavādī bhūtavādī kālavādī,

XXbsu014_u:835: sa evaṃsvabhāvān sarvadharmānanugacchan bhūyasyā mātrayā mahākaruṇāpūrvaṃgamatvena mahākaruṇādhipateyatayā mahākaruṇāparipūrṇārthaṃ lokasya saṃbhavaṃ ca vibhavaṃ ca vyavalokayate /
XXbsu014_u:836: tasya lokasya saṃbhavaṃ ca vibhavaṃ ca vyavalokayata evaṃ bhavati - yāvatyo lokasamudācāropapattayaḥ sarvāḥ, tā ātmābhiniveśato bhavanti /
XXbsu014_u:838: tasyaivaṃ bhavati - tena khalu punarime bālabuddhya ātmābhiniviṣṭā ajñānatimirāvṛtā
XXbsu014_u:840: teṣāṃ taiḥ saṃskārairavaropitaṃ cittabījaṃ sāsravaṃ sopādānamāyatyāṃ jātijarāmaraṇapunarbhavābhinirvṛttisaṃbhavopagataṃ bhavati /
XXbsu014_u:872: mriyamāṇasya vigacchataḥ saṃmūḍhasya sābhiṣvaṅgasya hṛdayasaṃtāpaḥ śokaḥ /
XXbsu014_u:877: evamayaṃ kevalo duḥkhaskandho duḥkhavṛkṣo 'bhinirvartate kārakavedakavirahita iti //
XXbsu014_u:879: yatra kārako nāsti, kriyāpi tatra paramārthato nopalabhyate /
XXbsu014_u:882: yānyapīmāni dvādaśa bhavāṅgāni tathāgatena prabhedaśo vyākhyātāni, api sarvāṇyeva tāni cittasamāśritāni
XXbsu014_u:883: tatkasya hetoḥ? yasmin vastuni hi rāgasaṃyuktaṃ cittamutpadyate tadvijñānam /
XXbsu014_u:896: ālambanataḥ sattvān saṃmohayati, hetuṃ ca dadāti saṃskārābhinirvṛttaye /
XXbsu014_u:898: anāgatavipākābhinirvṛtti ca kurvanti, hetuṃ ca dadati vijñānābhinirvṛttaye /
XXbsu014_u:900: bhavapratisaṃdhiṃ ca karoti, hetuṃ ca dadāti nāmarūpābhinirvṛttaye /
XXbsu014_u:909: ālambanasparśanaṃ ca karoti, hetuṃ ca dadāti vedanābhinirvṛttaye /
XXbsu014_u:911: iṣṭāniṣṭobhayavimuktānubhavanaṃ ca karoti, hetuṃ ca dadāti
XXbsu014_u:914: saṃrajanīyavastusaṃrāgaṃ ca karoti, hetuṃ ca dadātyupādānābhinirvṛttaye /
XXbsu014_u:916: saṃkleśabandhanaṃ ca karoti, hetuṃ ca dadāti bhavābhinirvṛttaye /
XXbsu014_u:919: anyabhavagatipratyadhiṣṭhānaṃ ca karoti, hetuṃ ca dadāti jātyabhinirvṛttaye /
XXbsu014_u:921: skandhonmajjanaṃ ca karoti, hetuṃ ca dadāti jarābhiniṃvṛttaye /
XXbsu014_u:923: indriyapariṇāmaṃ ca karoti, hetuṃ ca dadāti maraṇasamavadhānābhinirvṛttaye
XXbsu014_u:924: / maraṇamapi dvividhakāryapratyupasthānaṃ bhavati - saṃskāravidhvaṃsanaṃ ca karoti, aparijñānānucchedaṃ ceti //
XXbsu014_u:936: / evameva trivartma nirātmakamātmātmīyarahitaṃ saṃbhavati ca asaṃbhavayogena, vibhavati ca avibhavayogena svabhāvato naḍakalāpasadṛśam //
XXbsu014_u:937: api tu khalu punaryaducyate - avidyāpratyayāḥ saṃskārā ityeṣā
XXbsu014_u:943: api tu khalu punastriduḥkhatā dvādaśa bhavāṅgānyupādāya /
XXbsu014_u:961: yaduta bhavāṅgānusaṃdhitaśca ekacittasamavasaraṇataśca svakarmāsaṃbhedataśca avinirbhāgataśca trivartmānuvartanataśca pūrvāntapratyutpannāparāntāvekṣaṇataśca triduḥkhatāsamudayataśca hetupratyayaprabhavataśca utpādavyayavinibandhanataśca abhāvākṣayatāpratyavekṣaṇataśca //
XXbsu014_u:962: tasyaivaṃ dvādaśākāraṃ pratītyasamutpādaṃ pratyavekṣamāṇasya nirātmato niḥsattvato nirjīvato niṣpudgalataḥ kārakavedakarahitato 'svāmikato
XXbsu014_u:963: hetupratyayādhīnataḥ svabhāvaśūnyato viviktato 'svabhāvataśca prakṛtyā pratyavekṣamāṇasya śūnyatāvimokṣamukhamājātaṃ bhavati //
XXbsu014_u:967: tasyaivaṃ śūnyatānimittamavatīrṇasya na kaścidabhilāṣa utpadyate anyatra mahākaruṇāpūrvakātsattvaparipācanāt
XXbsu014_u:969: ya imāni trīṇi vimokṣamukhāni bhāvayan ātmaparasaṃjñāpagato kārakavedakasaṃjñāpagato bhāvābhāvasaṃjñāpagato bhūyasyā mātrayā mahākaruṇāpuraskṛtaḥ prayujyate 'pariniṣpannānāṃ bodhyaṅgānāṃ
XXbsu014_u:974: hanta vayamevaṃ bahudoṣaduṣṭaṃ saṃskṛtaṃ viditvā asya saṃyogasya asyāḥ sāmagryā vyavacchedaṃ kariṣyāmaḥ, na cātyantopaśamaṃ sarvasaṃskārāṇāmavirāgayiṣyāmaḥ sattvaparipācanatāyai //
XXbsu014_u:975: evamasya bhavanto jinaputrāḥ saṃskāragataṃ bahudoṣaduṣṭaṃ svabhāvarahitamanutpannāniruddhaṃ prakṛtyā pratyavekṣamāṇasya mahākaruṇābhinirhārataśca sattvakāryānutsargataśca saṅgajñānābhimukho nāma prajñāpāramitāvihāro 'bhimukhībhavatyavabhāsayogena /
XXbsu014_u:976: sa evaṃ jñānasamanvāgataḥ prajñāpāramitāvihārāvabhāsito bodhyaṅgāhārakāṃśca pratyayānupasaṃharati
XXbsu014_u:980: tasya asyāmabhimukhyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau sthitasya bodhisattvasya avatāraśūnyatā ca nāma samādhirājāyate
XXbsu014_u:987: tasya bhūyasyā mātrayā asyāmabhimukhyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau sthitasya bodhisattvasyabhedyāśayatā ca paripūryate /
XXbsu014_u:991: tasyaite daśa bodhisattvāśayāḥ svanugatā bhavanti tathāgatabodhau /
XXbsu014_u:1001: tasya asyāmabhimukhyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau sthitasya prajñāpāramitāvihāro 'tiriktatara ājāto bhavati, tīkṣṇā cānulomikī tṛtīyā kṣāntireṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ yathāvadanulomatayā na vilomatayā (Dbh 35)
XXbsu014_u:1002: tasya asyāmabhimukhyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau sthitasya bodhisattvasya yathāvatsamāpattiprajñājñānālokatayā prayujyate, pratipattitaścādhārayati
XXbsu014_u:1004: tasya asyāmabhimukhyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau sthitasya anekān kalpāṃstāni kuśalamūlāni bhūyasyā mātrayā uttaptaprabhāsvaratarāṇi bhavanti /
XXbsu014_u:1007: tadyathāpi nāma bhavanto jinaputrāstadeva jātarūpaṃ vaiḍūryaparisṛṣṭaṃ bhūyasyā mātrayottaptaprabhāsvarataraṃ bhavati, evameva bhavanto jinaputrā
XXbsu014_u:1008: bodhisattvasya asyāmabhimukhyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau sthitasya tāni kuśalamūlānyupāyaprajñājñānavicāritāni bhūyasyā mātrayottaptaprabhāsvaratarāṇi bhavanti, bhūyo bhūyaśca praśamāsaṃhāryatāṃ
XXbsu014_u:1010: tadyathāpi nāma bhavanto jinaputrāścandrābhā sattvāśrayāṃśca prahlādayati asaṃhāryā ca bhavati catasṛbhirvātamaṇḍalībhiḥ, evameva bhavanto jinaputra bodhisattvasya asyāmabhimukhyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau
XXbsu014_u:1011: sthitasya tāni kuśalamūlānyanekeṣāṃ sattvakoṭinayutaśatasahasrāṇāṃ kleśajvālāḥ praśamayanti, prahlādayanti, asaṃhāryāṇi ca bhavanti
XXbsu014_u:1013: tasya daśabhyaḥ pāramitābhyaḥ prajñāpāramitā atiriktatamā bhavati, na ca pariśeṣā na samudāgacchati
XXbsu014_u:1015: iyaṃ bhavanto jinaputrā bodhisattvasya abhimukhī nāma ṣaṣṭhī bodhisattvabhūmiḥ samāsanirdeśataḥ, yasyāṃ pratiṣṭhito bodhisattvo
XXbsu014_u:1016: bhūyastvena sunirmito bhavati devarājaṃ kṛtī prabhuḥ sattvānāmabhimānapratiprasrabdhaye kuśalaḥ sattvānyābhimānikadharmebhyo vinivartayitum /
XXbsu014_u:1017: asaṃhāryaśca bhavati sarvaśrāvakaparipṛcchāyāṃ kuśalaḥ sattvān pratītyasamutpāde 'vatārayitum
XXbsu014_u:1022: vajragarbha āha - yo 'yaṃ bhavanto jinaputrā bodhisattvaḥ ṣaṣṭyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau suparipūrṇabodhisattvamārgaḥ
XXbsu014_u:1043: evirbhavanto jinaputrā daśabhirupāyaprajñājñānābhinirhṛtibhirmārgāntarārambhaviśeṣairbodhisattvaḥ ṣaṣṭhyā bodhisattvabhūmeḥ saptamīṃ bodhisattvabhūmimākrānta ityucyate //
XXbsu014_u:1067: samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ viṣayo yasya na sukarā saṃkhyā kartuṃ kalpakoṭiśatasahasrairyāvadetāvadbhirapi kalpakoṭiniyutaśatasahasraiḥ /
XXbsu014_u:1070: sa evaṃ supratyavekṣitajñānābhijñaḥ satatasamitamabhiyuktopāyaprajñāparibhāviteṣu mārgāntarārambhaviśeṣeṣu supratiṣṭhito bhavatyavicālyayogena //
XXbsu014_u:1074: svapnāntaragato 'pyapagatanīvaraṇaḥ sarveryāpathe sthito 'virahito bhavati ebhirevaṃrūpaiḥ saṃjñāmanasikāraiḥ /
XXbsu014_u:1075: tasya sarvacittotpāde daśānāṃ bodhisattvapāramitānāṃ samudāgamaparipūriḥ samudāgacchati /
XXbsu014_u:1076: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? tathā hi sa bodhisattvaḥ sarvāṃścittotpādānutpannotpannān mahākaruṇāpūrvakān buddhadharmasamudāgamāya tathāgatajñānāya pariṇāmayati
XXbsu014_u:1077: / tatra yaḥ kuśalamūlasya sattvebhya utsargo buddhajñānaṃ paryeṣamāṇasya,
XXbsu014_u:1080: yā kṛpāmaitrīpūrvagamā sarvasattveṣu kṣāntiḥ, iyamasya kṣāntipāramitā /
XXbsu014_u:1084: yā sarvadharmāṇāṃ prakṛtyanutpādābhimukhī kṣāntiḥ, iyamasya prajñāpāramitā /
XXbsu014_u:1090: evamasya bhavanto jinaputrā bodhisattvasya dūraṃgamāyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau sthitasya imā daśa pāramitāḥ kṣaṇe kṣaṇe paripūryante /
XXbsu014_u:1092: paripūryante, catvāri ca adhiṣṭhānāni, saptatriṃśad bodhipakṣyāśca dharmāḥ, trīṇi ca vimokṣamukhāni, samāsataḥ sarvabodhyaṅgikā dharmāḥ kṣaṇe kṣaṇe paripūryante //
XXbsu014_u:1094: kiṃ punarbho jinaputrā asyāmeva saptamyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau sthitasya bodhisattvasya sarvabodhyaṅgikā dharmāḥ kṣaṇe kṣaṇe paripūryante,
XXbsu014_u:1095: āhosvitsarvāsu daśasu bodhisattvabhūmiṣu? vajragarbha āha - sarvāsu bho jinaputrā daśasu bodhisattvabhūmiṣu bodhisattvasya sarvabodhyaṅgāni kṣaṇe
XXbsu014_u:1096: kṣaṇe paripūryante, tadatirekeṇa punarasyāmeva saptamyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau
XXbsu014_u:1097: / tatkasya hetoḥ? iyaṃ bho jinaputrā bodhisattvabhūmiḥ prāyogikacaryāparipūraṇī ca jñānābhijñānacaryākramaṇī ca /
XXbsu014_u:1098: api tu khalu punarbho jinaputrāḥ prathamāyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau sarvapraṇidhānādhyālambena bodhisattvasya sarvabodhyaṅgāni kṣaṇe kṣaṇe paripūryante /
XXbsu014_u:1104: asyāṃ tu saptamyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau sarvabuddhadharmasamutthāpanatayā kṣaṇe kṣaṇe sarvabodhyāṅgāni paripūryante /
XXbsu014_u:1108: tadyathāpi nāma bho jinaputrā dvayorlokadhātvoḥ saṃkliṣṭaviśuddhāśayaśca lokadhātorekāntapariśuddhāśayaśca lokadhātorlokāntarikā duratikramā na śakyā yathātathātikramitumanyatra mahābhijñābalādhānāt, evameva bho jinaputra vyāmiśrapariśuddhā bodhisattvacaryāntarikā duratikramā na śakyā
XXbsu014_u:1110: vimukticandra āha - kiṃ punarbho jinaputra saptasu bodhisattvabhūmiṣu kleśacaryāsaṃkliṣṭā bodhisattvacaryā pratyetavyā? vajragarbha āha -
XXbsu014_u:1111: prathamāmeva bho jinaputra bodhisattvabhūmimupādāya sarvābodhisattvacaryāpagatakleśakalmāṣā bodhipariṇāmanādhipatyena pratyetavyā /
XXbsu014_u:1112: yathābhāgimārgasamatayā, (na ca) tāvatsaptasu bodhisattvabhūmiṣu samatikrāntā kleśacaryetyavācanīyā
XXbsu014_u:1113: tadyathāpi nāma bho jinaputra rājā cakravartī divyaṃ hastiratnamabhirūḍhaścaturo
XXbsu014_u:1114: dvīpānākramati, manuṣyaduḥkhadāridryasaṃkleśadoṣāṃśca prajānāti, na ca tairdoṣairlipyate
XXbsu014_u:1116: yadā punarmanuṣyāśrayaṃ hitvā brahmalokopapanno bhavati brāhmyavimānamabhirūḍhaḥ, sahasralokadhātumalpakṛcchreṇa
XXbsu014_u:1117: paśyatyanuvicarati, brahmapratibhāsaṃ cādarśayati, na ca manuṣya iti
XXbsu014_u:1118: prabhāvyate, evameva bhoḥ prathamāṃ bhūmimupādāya bodhisattvaḥ pāramitāyānābhirūḍhaḥ sarvajagadanuvicaran saṃkleśadoṣān prajānāti, na ca tairdoṣairlipyate samyagmārgābhirūḍhatvāt /
XXbsu014_u:1120: saptasu bhūmiṣu sarvaprāyogikacaryāṃ vihāya saptamyā bhūmeraṣṭamīṃ bodhisattvabhūmimavakrānto bhavati, tadā pariśuddhaṃ bodhisattvayānamabhirūḍhaḥ sarvajagadanuvicaran sarvajagatsaṃkleśadoṣān prajānāti, na ca tairdoṣairlipyate
XXbsu014_u:1122: asyāṃ punarbho jinaputra sapyamyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau sthito bodhisattvo bhūyastvena rāgādipramukhaṃ sarvakleśagaṇaṃ samatikrānto bhavati /
XXbsu014_u:1123: so 'syāṃ dūraṃgamāyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau caran bodhisattvo 'saṃkleśāniṣkleśa iti vaktavyaḥ
XXbsu014_u:1124: tatkasmāt? asamudācārātsarvakleśānāṃ na saṃkleśa iti vaktavyaḥ /
XXbsu014_u:1128: adhyāśayapariśuddhena vākkarmaṇā adhyāśayapariśuddhena manaskarmaṇā samanvāgato bhavati /
XXbsu014_u:1131: ye ceme daśa kuśalāḥ karmapathāḥ samyaksaṃbuddhānubhāvitāḥ, tān satatasamitamanuvartate
XXbsu014_u:1132: yāni laukikāni śilpasthānakarmasthānāni yānyabhinirhṛtāni pañcamyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau,
XXbsu014_u:1134: sa ācāryaḥ saṃmato bhavati trisāhasra mahāsāhasralokadhātau, sthāpayitvā tathāgatānarhataḥ samyaksambuddhān, aṣṭamīṃ bhūmimupādāya ca bodhisattvān /
XXbsu014_u:1135: nāsya kaścitsamo bhavatyāśayena vā prayogeṇa vā /
XXbsu014_u:1136: yāni cemāni dhyānāni (Dbh 39) samādhayaḥ samapattayo 'bhijñā vimokṣāśca, tānyasya sarveṇa
XXbsu014_u:1138: na ca tāvadvipākataḥ pariniṣpannāni bhavanti tadyathāpi nāma aṣṭamyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau sthitasya bodhisattvasya /
XXbsu014_u:1139: asyāṃ saptamyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau sthitasya bodhisattvasya sarvacittotpādeṣu prajñopāyabhāvanābalaṃ paripūryate /
XXbsu014_u:1141: so 'syāṃ saptamyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau sthitaḥ san suvicitavicayaṃ ca nāma bodhisattvasamādhi samāpadyate /
XXbsu014_u:1151: sa evaṃpramukhāni mahābhijñājñānamukhāni paripūrṇāni daśa samādhiśatasahasrāṇi bhūmipariśodhikāni samāpadyate //
XXbsu014_u:1152: sa eṣāṃ samādhīnāmupāyaprajñāsupariśodhitānāṃ pratilambhānmahākaruṇābalena cātikrānto bhavati śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmim, abhimukhaśca bhavati prajñājñānavicāraṇābhūmeḥ //
XXbsu014_u:1153: tasya asyāṃ saptamyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau sthitasya bodhisattvasya apramāṇaṃ kāyakarma nimittāpagataṃ pravartate /
XXbsu014_u:1155: vimukticandra āha - nanu bho jinaputra, prathamāyāmeva bodhisattvabhūmau sthitasya bodhisattvasya apramāṇaṃ kāyavāṅmanaskarma sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhacaryāṃ samatikrāntaṃ bhavati? vajragarbha āha -
XXbsu014_u:1158: asyāṃ tu punaḥ saptamyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau svabuddhigocaravicārapratilambhādasaṃhāryaṃ śrāvakapratyekabuddhairbhavati tadyathāpi nāma bhavanto jinaputrā rājakulaprasūto rājaputro rājalakṣaṇasamanvāgato jātamātra eva sarvāmātyagaṇamabhibhavati
XXbsu014_u:1160: yadā punaḥ sa saṃvṛddho bhavati tadā svabuddhibalādhānataḥ sarvāmātyakriyāsamatikrānto bhavati,
XXbsu014_u:1161: evameva bho jinaputrā bodhisattvaḥ sahacittotpādena sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānabhibhavatyadhyāśayamāhātmyena, na punaḥ svabuddhivicāreṇa /
XXbsu014_u:1162: asyāṃ tu saptamyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau sthito bodhisattvaḥ svaviṣayajñānaviśeṣamāhātmyāvasthitatvātsarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhakriyāmatikrānto bhavati //
XXbsu014_u:1163: sa khalu punarbho bodhisattvo 'syāṃ saptamyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau sthito
XXbsu014_u:1166: [yena parimārgaṇābhiyogena nirodhaprāptaśca bhavati, na ca nirodhaṃ sākṣātkaroti //]
XXbsu014_u:1167: vimukticandra āha - katamāṃ bhūmimupādāya bodhisattvo nirodhaṃ
XXbsu014_u:1168: samāpadyate? vajragarbha āha - ṣaṣṭhīṃ bho jinaputra
XXbsu014_u:1171: punaḥ saptamyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau pratiṣṭhito bodhisattvaścittakṣaṇe cittakṣaṇe nirodhaṃ samāpadyate ca vyuttiṣṭhate ca /
XXbsu014_u:1172: na ca nirodhaḥ sākṣātkṛta iti vaktavyaḥ /
XXbsu014_u:1173: tena so 'cintyena kāyavāṅmana skarmaṇā samanvāgata ityucyate /
XXbsu014_u:1174: āścaryaṃ bho yatra hi nāma bodhisattvo bhūtakoṭivihāreṇa ca viharati, na ca nirodhaṃ sākṣātkaroti
XXbsu014_u:1175: tadyathāpi nāma bho jinaputra puruṣaḥ kuśalo mahāsāgare vārilakṣaṇābhijñaḥ paṇḍito vyakto medhāvī tatropagatayā mīmāṃsayā samanvāgato mahāsāgare mahāyānapātrābhirūḍho vahanakuśalaśca bhavati, vārikuśalaśca bhavati, na ca mahāsamudre vāridoṣairlipyate, evameva bho jinaputra asyāṃ saptamyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau pratiṣṭhito bodhisattvaḥ sarvajñajñānamahāsāgarāvatīrṇaḥ pāramitāmahāyānapātrābhirūḍho bhūtakoṭivihāreṇa ca viharati, na ca nirodhaṃ sākṣātkaroti, (na ca sasṃkṛtātyantavyupaśamavitarkadoṣairlipyate)
XXbsu014_u:1176: sa evaṃ jñānabalādhānaprāptaḥ samādhijñānabalabhāvanābhinirhṛtayā buddhyā mahatopāyaprajñābalādhānena saṃsāramukhaṃ cādarśayati /
XXbsu014_u:1197: tasyaivaṃ jñānasamanvāgatasya asyāṃ saptasyāṃ dūraṃgamāyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau sthitasya bodhisattvasya bahavo buddhā ābhāsamāgacchanti
XXbsu014_u:1199: teṣāṃ ca sakāśādgauravacitrīkāreṇa satkṛtya dharmadeśanāṃ śṛṇoti, udgṛhṇāti dhārayati /
XXbsu014_u:1209: pariśuddhyanti, karmaṇyāni ca bhavanti, paryavadānaṃ cāgacchanti /
XXbsu014_u:1210: tadyathāpi nāma bho jinaputrāḥ tadeva jātarūpaṃ sarvaratnapratyuptaṃ bhūyasyā mātrayottaptataraṃ bhavati, prabhāsvarataraṃ bhavati,
XXbsu014_u:1211: asaṃhāryataraṃ ca bhavatyanyābhyo bhūṣaṇavikṛtibhyaḥ, evameva bho jinaputrāḥ ... tāni kuśalamūlānyupāyaprajñājñānābhinirhṛtāni
XXbsu014_u:1212: mātrayottaptatarāṇi (Dbh 41) bhavanti prabhāsvaratarāṇi, paryavadātatarāṇi asaṃhāryatarāṇi ca bhavanti sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhaiḥ /
XXbsu014_u:1213: tadyathāpi nāma bho jinaputrāḥ sūryābhā asaṃhāryā bhavanti sarvajyotirgaṇacandrābhābhiścaturṣu mahādvīpeṣu, sarvasnehagatāni bhūyastvena pariśoṣayanti, sarvaśasyāni paripācayanti, evameva bho jinaputrā ... tāni kuśalamūlānyasaṃhāryāṇi bhavanti
XXbsu014_u:1214: sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhaiḥ, caturviparyāsagatāni ca sarvakleśasnehagatāni bhūyastvena pariśoṣayanti /
XXbsu014_u:1216: tasya daśabhyaḥ pāramitābhya upāyakauśalyapāramitā atiriktatamā bhavati, na ca pariśeṣā na samudāgacchati yathābalaṃ yathābhajamānam /
XXbsu014_u:1217: iyaṃ bho jinaputrā bodhisattvasya dūraṃgamā nāma saptamī bodhisattvabhūmiḥ samāsanirdeśataḥ,
XXbsu014_u:1218: yasyāṃ pratiṣṭhito bodhisattvo bhūyastvena vaśavartī bhavati devarājaḥ kṛtī prabhuḥ sattvānāmabhisamayajñānopasaṃhāreṣvaparyantaḥ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhaparipṛcchāsu kuśalaḥ sattvānniyāmamavakrāmayitum
XXbsu014_u:1223: vajragarbho bodhisattva āha - yo 'yaṃ bhavanto jinaputrā bodhisattvaḥ
XXbsu014_u:1224: saptasu bodhisattvabhūmiṣu sukṛtavicayaḥ prajñopāyābhyāṃ supariśodhitamārgaḥ susaṃbhṛtasaṃbhāraḥ suparibaddhamahāpraṇidhānaḥ adhiṣṭhitatathāgatādhiṣṭhānaḥ svakuśalamūlabalādhānaprāptaḥ tathāgatabalavaiśāradyāveṇikabuddhadharmānugatasaṃjñāmanasikāraḥ supariśodhitādhyāśayasaṃkalpa puṇyajñānabalābhyudgataḥ mahākaruṇākṛpābhyāṃ sarvasattvānutsṛṣṭaprayogaḥ apramāṇajñānapathānugataḥ, sa sarvadharmāṇāmādyanutpannatāṃ ca yathābhūtamavatarati /
XXbsu014_u:1225: ajātatāṃ ca alakṣaṇatāṃ ca asaṃbhūtatāṃ ca avināśitāṃ ca aniṣṭhitatāṃ ca apravṛttitāṃ ca anabhinivṛttitāṃ ca abhāvasvabhāvatāṃ ca ādimadhyaparyavasānasamatāṃ ca tathatāvikalpasarvajñajñānapraveśatāṃ ca sarvadharmāṇāṃ yathābhūtamavatarati /
XXbsu014_u:1228: tatra bhavanto jinaputrā evaṃ kṣāntisamanvāgato bodhisattvaḥ sahapratilambhādacalāyā bodhisattvabhūmergambhīraṃ bodhisattvavihāramanuprāpto bhavati durājñātamasaṃbhinnaṃ sarvanimittāpagataṃ sarvasaṃjñāgrahavyāvṛttamapramāṇamasaṃhāryaṃ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhaiḥ sarvavivekābhimukhībhūtam /
XXbsu014_u:1231: bhavati, evameva bhavanto jinaputrā bodhisattvo 'syā aṣṭamyā acalāyā bodhisattvabhūmeḥ sahapratilambhātsarvābhogavigato 'nābhogadharmatāprāptaḥ
XXbsu014_u:1233: tadyathāpi nāma bho jinaputrāḥ puruṣaḥ suptaḥ svapnāntaragato mahaughaprāptamātmānaṃ saṃjānīte
XXbsu014_u:1237: evameva bho jinaputrā bodhisattvaścaturmahaughaprāptaṃ sattvakāyaṃ saṃjānāna uttaraṇābhiprāyaḥ sarvajñajñānābhisaṃbodhāya mahadvyāyāmautsukyamārabhate /

XXbsu014_u:1240: tadyathāpi nāma bho jinaputrā brahmalokopapattisthitaḥ kāmāvacarān kleśān na samudācarati, evameva bho jinaputrā bodhisattvo
XXbsu014_u:1251: tasya khalu bho jinaputra bodhisattvasya evamimāmacalāṃ bodhisattvabhūmimanugatasya pūrvapraṇidhānabalādhānasthitasya buddhā bhagavantastasmin dharmamukhasrotasi tathāgatajñānopasaṃhāraṃ kurvanti /
XXbsu014_u:1252: evaṃ cainaṃ bruvanti - sādhu sādhu kulaputra /
XXbsu014_u:1254: api tu khalu punaḥ kulaputra yā asmākaṃ daśabalacaturvaiśāradyabuddhadharmasamṛddhiḥ, sā tava nāsti /

XXbsu014_u:1257: api tu khalu punaḥ kulaputra kiṃcāpi tvayaivaṃ śāntavimokṣavihāro 'nuprāptaḥ, imān punaraśāntānapraśāntān bālapṛthagjanān nānākleśasamudācāraprāptān vividhavitarkopahatamānasān
XXbsu014_u:1259: api tu khalu punaḥ kulaputra pūrvapraṇidhānamanusmara sattvārthasaṃprāpaṇaṃ jñānamukhācintyatāṃ ca /
XXbsu014_u:1260: api tu khalu punaḥ kulaputra eṣā sarvadharmāṇāṃ dharmatā /
XXbsu014_u:1261: utpādādvā tathāgatānāmanutpādādvā sthitaivaiṣā dharmatā dharmadhātusthitiḥ yadidaṃ sarvadharmaśūnyatā sarvadharmānupalabdhiḥ /
XXbsu014_u:1264: api tu khalu punaḥ kulaputra prekṣasva tāvat tvamasmākaṃ kāyāpramāṇatāṃ ca jñānāpramāṇatāṃ ca buddhakṣetrāpramāṇatāṃ ca jñānābhinirhārāpramāṇatāṃ ca prabhāmaṇḍalāpramāṇatāṃ ca svarāṅgaviśuddhyapramāṇatāṃ ca /
XXbsu014_u:1266: api tu khalu punaḥ kulaputra ekastveṣa āloko yo 'yaṃ sarvadharmanirvikalpālokaḥ /

XXbsu014_u:1270: iti hi bho jinaputra te buddhā bhagavanta evaṃbhūmyanugatasya bodhisattvasya evaṃ pramukhānyaprameyāṇyasaṃkhyeyāni
XXbsu014_u:1274: te cedbuddhā bhagavantastaṃ bodhisattvamevaṃ sarvajñajñānābhinirhāramukheṣu nāvatārayeyuḥ, tadevāsya parinirvāṇaṃ bhavetsarvasattvakāryapratiprasrabdhiśca /
XXbsu014_u:1275: tena khalu punarbuddhā bhagavantastasya bodhisattvasya tāvadapramāṇaṃ
XXbsu014_u:1276: jñānābhinirhārakarmopasaṃharanti, yasyaikakṣaṇābhinirhṛtasya jñānābhinirhārakarmaṇaḥ sa pūrvakaḥ prathamacittotpādamupādāya yāvatsaptamīṃ bhūmipratiṣṭhāmupāgata ārambhaḥ śatatamīmapi kalāṃ nopeti,
XXbsu014_u:1281: tathā hi bho jinaputra pūrvamekakāyābhinirhāratayā caryābhinirhāro 'bhūt /
XXbsu014_u:1282: imāṃ punarbhūmiṃ samārūḍhasya bodhisattvasya apramāṇakāyavibhaktito bodhisattvacaryābalaṃ samudāgacchati /
XXbsu014_u:1284: apramāṇabuddhapūjopasthānataḥ apramāṇadharmakāyānubodhataḥ apramāṇābhijñābalādhānābhinirhārataḥ apramāṇaparṣanmaṇḍalavibhaktyabhinirhārataśca apramāṇānugatena kāyavāṅmanaskarmābhinirhāreṇa sarvabodhisattvacaryābalaṃ samudāgacchatyavicālyayogena /
XXbsu014_u:1285: tadyathāpi nāma bho jinaputra mahāsamudragāmī poto 'prāpto mahāsamudraṃ sābhogavāhano bhavati
XXbsu014_u:1286: sa eva samanantaramanuprāpto mahāsamudramanābhogavāhano vātamaṇḍalīpraṇīto yadekadivasena mahāsamudre kramate, tatsarvasābhogavāhanatayā na śakyaṃ
XXbsu014_u:1288: evameva bho jinaputra bodhisattvaḥ susaṃbhṛtamahākuśalamūlasaṃbhāro mahāyānasamudāgamābhirūḍho mahābodhisattvacaryāsāgaramanuprāpto yadekamuhūrtena jñānānābhogatayā
XXbsu014_u:1289: sarvajñajñānenākramati, tanna śakyaṃ pūrvakeṇa sābhogakarmaṇā kalpaśatasahasreṇāpi tāvadaprameyamanuprāptum
XXbsu014_u:1290: tatra bho jinaputra bodhisattvo 'ṣṭamīṃ bodhisattvabhūmimanuprāpto mahatyā upāyakauśalyajñānābhinirhārānābhogaprasṛtayā bodhisattvabuddhyā sarvajñajñānaṃ vicārayan lokadhātusaṃbhavaṃ ca vicārayati,
XXbsu014_u:1292: sa yathā ca lokaḥ saṃvartate, taṃ ca prajānāti /
XXbsu014_u:1300: yāvatkālaṃ ca loko vivṛttastiṣṭhati, taṃ ca prajānāti sarvatra cānavaśeṣataḥ /
XXbsu014_u:1301: sa pṛthivīdhātuparīttatāṃ ca prajānāti mahadgatatāṃ ca ... apramāṇatāṃ ca ... vibhaktitāṃ ca prajānāti /
XXbsu014_u:1306: prajānāti, mahadgatatāṃ ca apramāṇatāṃ ca vibhaktitāṃ ca prajānāti /
XXbsu014_u:1308: asyāṃ ca lokadhātau yāvanti pṛthivīdhātoḥ paramāṇurajāṃsi tāni prajānāti /
XXbsu014_u:1312: yāvantyo ratnavibhaktayo yāvanti ca ratnaparamāṇurajāṃsi tāni prajānāti /
XXbsu014_u:1315: sa sattvānāṃ kāyaudārikatāṃ ca kāyasūkṣmatāṃ ca kāyavibhaktitāṃ ca prajānāti /
XXbsu014_u:1322: sa evaṃ paramāṇurajaḥprabhedajñānāvatīrṇaḥ kāmadhātusaṃvartaṃ ca prajānāti /
XXbsu014_u:1331: kāmadhātuparīttatāṃ ca mahadgatatāṃ ca apramāṇatāṃ ca vibhaktitāṃ ca prajānāti /
XXbsu014_u:1333: traidhātukavicārajñānānugame svabhinirhṛtajñānālokaḥ sattvakāyaprabhedajñānakuśalaḥ kṣetrakāyavibhāgajñānakuśalaśca sattvopapattyāyatanābhinirhāre buddhiṃ cārayati /
XXbsu014_u:1334: sa yādṛśī sattvānāmupapattiśca kāyasamudāgamaśca, tādṛśameva svakāyamadhitiṣṭhati sattvaparipācanāya

XXbsu014_u:1337: evaṃ dve vā tisro vā catasro vā pañca vā daśa vā viṃśatirvā triṃśadvā catvāriṃśadvā pañcāśadvā śataṃ vā yāvadanabhilāpyā api trisāhasramahāsāhasrā lokadhātūḥ spharitvā sattvānāṃ svakāyaṃ ... peyālaṃ ... pratibhāsajñānānugamanatayā /

XXbsu014_u:1339: calati, anabhilāpyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu tathāgataparṣanmaṇḍaleṣu ca pratibhāsaprāpto bhavati
XXbsu014_u:1340: yādṛśī sattvānāṃ kāyavibhaktiśca varṇaliṅgasaṃsthānārohapariṇāhādhimuktyadhyāśayaśca teṣu buddhakṣetreṣu teṣu ca parṣanmaṇḍaleṣu tatra tatra tathā tathā svakāyamādarśayati /

XXbsu014_u:1363: kāyasaṃdarśanamakṣūṇamavandhyaṃ ca sattvaparipākavinayāya) sa sattvakāyaṃ ca prajānāti
XXbsu014_u:1375: sa sattvānāṃ cittāśayābhinirhāramājñāya yaṃ yameva kāyaṃ yasmin yasmin kāye

XXbsu014_u:1397: yathāvannistīraṇatāṃ ca phalaprayogasaṃgṛhītatāṃ (Dbh 46) ca laukikalokottaravibhāgatāṃ ca

XXbsu014_u:1446: evaṃ jñānasvabhinirhṛtaḥ khalu punarbho jinaputra bodhisattvo buddhagotrānugato buddhaguṇaprabhāvabhāsitastathāgateryāpathacaryācāritrānugato buddhaviṣayābhimukhaḥ satatasamitaṃ svadhiṣṭhitatathāgatādhiṣṭhānaśca bhavati śakrabrahmalokapālapratyudgataśca vajrapāṇisatatānubaddhaśca samādhibalānutsṛṣṭaśca ca apramāṇakāyavibhaktyabhinirhṛtaśca sarvakāyacaryābalopagataśca mahābhijñāvipākapariniṣpannaśca anantasamādhivaśavartī ca apramāṇavyākaraṇapratyeṣakaśca

XXbsu014_u:1459: sa bhūyasyā mātrayā tathāgatadharmakośaprāpto 'saṃhāryo bhavati lokadhātuparipṛcchānirdeśeṣu
XXbsu014_u:1461: tadyathāpi nāma bho jinaputra tadeva jātarūpaṃ supariniṣṭhitaṃ kuśalena karmāreṇa suparikarmakṛtaṃ jambūdvīpasvāminaḥ kaṇṭhe śirasi vā ābaddhamasaṃhāryaṃ bhavati sarvajambūdvīpakānāṃ
XXbsu014_u:1462: sattvānāmābharaṇavikṛtaiḥ, evameva bho jinaputra asyāmacalāyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau sthitasya bodhisattvasya tāni kuśalamūlānyasaṃhāryāṇi
XXbsu014_u:1464: imāṃ ca bhūmimanugatasya bodhisattvasya mahatī prajñājñānaprabhā sattvānāṃ kleśatamāṃsi praśamayati suvibhaktajñānamukhābhinirhāratayā /
XXbsu014_u:1465: tadyathāpi nāma bho jinaputra sāhasriko mahābrahmā sāhasralokadhātuṃ (Dbh 48) maitryā spharitvā prabhayāvabhāsayati, evameva bho jinaputra bodhisattvo 'syāmacalāyāṃ
XXbsu014_u:1466: bodhisattvabhūmau sthito yāvaddaśabuddhakṣetraśatasahasraparamāṇurajaḥsamān lokadhātūn mahatā maitryavabhāsena spharitvā sattvānāṃ kleśaparidāhānanupūrveṇa praśamayati,
XXbsu014_u:1468: tasya daśabhyaḥ pāramitābhyaḥ praṇidhānapāramitā atiriktatamā bhavati, na ca pariśeṣāsu na samudāgacchati yathābalaṃ
XXbsu014_u:1470: iyaṃ bhavanto jinaputrā bodhisattvasya acalā nāma aṣṭamī bodhisattvabhūmiḥ samāsanirdeśataḥ
XXbsu014_u:1472: yasyāṃ pratiṣṭhito bodhisattvo bhūyastvena mahābrahmā bhavati sāhasrādhipatiḥ /
XXbsu014_u:1479: vajragarbho bodhisattva āha - yo 'yaṃ bhavanto jinaputrā bodhisattva
XXbsu014_u:1480: evamapramāṇajñeyavicāritayā buddhyā bhūyaścottarān śāntān vimokṣānadhyavasyan adhyālambamānaḥ bhūyaścottaraṃ tathāgatajñānaṃ susamāptaṃ vicārayan tathāgataguhyānupraveśaṃ cāvataran acintyajñānamāhātmyaṃ ca pravicinvan dhāraṇīsamādhipravicayaṃ ca pariśodhayan abhijñāvaipulyaṃ cābhinirharan lokadhātuvibhaktiṃ cānugacchan tathāgatabalavaiśādyāveṇikabuddhadharmāsaṃhāryatāṃ ca parikarmayan
XXbsu014_u:1481: tathāgatadharmacakrapravartanavṛṣabhatāṃ cānukramamāṇaḥ mahākaruṇādhiṣṭhānapratilambhaṃ cānutsṛjan navamīṃ bodhisattvabhūmimākramati /
XXbsu014_u:1493: sa evaṃjñānānugatayā buddhyā sattvacittagahanopacāraṃ ca yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
XXbsu014_u:1503: sa sattvānāṃ cittavaimātratāṃ ca yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
XXbsu014_u:1504: cittavicitratāṃ ca cittakṣaṇalaghuparivartabhaṅgabhaṅgatāṃ ca cittaśarīratāṃ ca cittānantyasarvataḥprabhūtatāṃ ca cittaprabhāsvaratāṃ ca cittasaṃkleśaniḥkleśatāṃ ca cittabandhavimokṣatāṃ ca cittamāyāviṭhapanatāṃ ca cittayathāgatipratyupasthānatāṃ ca yāvadanekāni cittanānātvasahasrāṇi yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
XXbsu014_u:1505: sa kleśānāṃ dūrānugatatāṃ ca yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti
XXbsu014_u:1575: sa sattvarāśīnāṃ samyaktvaniyatatāṃ ca prajānāti mithyātvaniyatatāṃ ca /
XXbsu014_u:1586: iti hi bho jinaputra evaṃjñānānugato bodhisattvaḥ sādhumatyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau pratiṣṭhita ityucyate //
XXbsu014_u:1587: so 'syāṃ sādhumatyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau sthita evaṃ caryāvimātratāṃ sattvānāmajñāya tathaiva mokṣopasaṃhāramupasaṃharati /
XXbsu014_u:1594: sa evaṃ jñātvā tathatvāya sattvebhyo dharmaṃ deśayati /
XXbsu014_u:1595: yathāśayavibhaktito yathānuśayavibhaktito yathendriyavibhaktito (Dbh 51) yathādhimuktivibhaktito yathāgocaravibhāgajñānopasaṃhārataḥ sarvagocarajñānānugamanato
XXbsu014_u:1596: yathādhātugahanopacārānugamanato yathāgatyupapattikleśakarmavāsanānuvartanato yathārāśivyavasthānānugamanato yathāyānādhimokṣavimuktiprāptito 'nantavarṇarūpakāyasaṃdarśanataḥ sarvalokadhātumanojñasvaravijñāpanataḥ sarvarutaravitaparijñānataḥ sarvapratisaṃvidviniścayakauśalyataśca dharmaṃ deśayati //
XXbsu014_u:1597: so 'syāṃ sādhumatyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau sthitaḥ san bodhisattvo dharmabhāṇakatvaṃ kārayati, tathāgatadharmakośaṃ ca rakṣati /
XXbsu014_u:1598: sa dharmābhāṇakagatimupagato 'pramāṇajñānānugatena kauśalyena catuḥpratisaṃvidabhinirhṛtayā bodhisattvavācā dharmaṃ deśayati /
XXbsu014_u:1640: arthapratisaṃvidā caturaśītisattvacaritasahasrāṇāṃ yathāśayaṃ yathendriyaṃ yathādhimuktivibhaktitastathāgataghoṣaṃ prajānati /
XXbsu014_u:1643: sa evaṃ pratisaṃvidā jñānābhinirhārakuśalo bho jinaputra bodhisattvo navamīṃ bodhisattvabhūmimanuprāptastathāgatadharmakośaprāpto mahādharmabhāṇakatvaṃ ca kurvāṇaḥ arthavatīdhāraṇīpratilabdhaśca bhavati /
XXbsu014_u:1653: sa evamādīnāṃ dhāraṇīpadānāṃ paripūrṇāni daśadhāraṇīmukhāsaṃkhyeyaśatasahasrāṇi pratilabhate
XXbsu014_u:1654: tathā asaṃkhyeyaśatasahasrānugatenaiva svarāṅgakauśalyena tāvadapramāṇānugatenaiva pratibhānavibhaktimukhena dharmaṃ deśayati /
XXbsu014_u:1655: sa evamapramāṇairdhāraṇīmukhāsaṃkhyeyaśatasahasrairdaśasu dikṣu aprameyāṇāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ sakāśāddharmaṃ śṛṇoti /
XXbsu014_u:1660: sa praṇidhānamātreṇa bahutaraṃ samyaksaṃbuddhasakāśāddharmamukhālokaṃ saṃpratīcchati, na tveva mahābāhuśrutyaprāptaḥ śrāvakaḥ śrutodgrahaṇadhāraṇīpratilabdhaḥ
XXbsu014_u:1662: sa evaṃ dhāraṇīprāptaśca bhavati pratibhānaprāptaśca dharmasāṃkathyaṃ saṃniṣaṇṇaḥ sarvāvatīṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātuṃ spharitvā yathāśayavibhaktitaḥ sattvebhyo dharmaṃ deśayati dharmāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ /
XXbsu014_u:1663: dharmāsanaṃ cāsya tathāgatānabhiṣekabhūmiprāptān bodhisattvān sthāpayitvā sarvato viśiṣṭamapramāṇāvabhāsaprāptaṃ bhavati /
XXbsu014_u:1664: sa dharmāsane niṣaṇṇa ākāṅkṣan ekaghoṣodāhāreṇa sarvaparṣadaṃ nānāghoṣarutavimātratayā saṃjñāpayati
XXbsu014_u:1668: ākāṅkṣan yāvattrisāhasramahāsāhasrāyāṃ lokadhātau rūpāvabhāsāstebhyaḥ sarvarūpāvabhāsebhyo dharmarutāni niścārayati /
XXbsu014_u:1673: ākāṅkṣan anabhilāpyānabhilāpyalokadhātvaparyantataḥ pṛthivyaptejovāyuskandhebhyaḥ sūkṣmaparamāṇurajaḥprabhedata ekaikaparamāṇurajonabhilāpyāni dharmamukhāni niścārayati /
XXbsu014_u:1674: sacettaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātuparyāpannaḥ sarvasattvā upasaṃkramya ekakṣaṇalavamuhūrtena praśnān paripṛccheyuḥ,
XXbsu014_u:1675: ekaikaśca teṣāmapramāṇarutavimātratayā paripṛcchet, yaṃ caikaḥ sattvaḥ
XXbsu014_u:1676: paripṛcchenna taṃ dvitīyaḥ, taṃ bodhisattvaḥ sarvasattvarutapadavyañjanamudgṛhṇiyāt /
XXbsu014_u:1677: udgṛhya caikarutābhivyāhāreṇa teṣāṃ sarvasattvānāṃ cittāśayān paritoṣayet
XXbsu014_u:1679: ekakṣaṇalavamuhūrtena praśnān paripṛccheyuḥ, ekaikaśca teṣāmapramāṇarutavimātratayā paripṛcchet, yaṃ caikaḥ paripṛcchenna taṃ
XXbsu014_u:1680: dvitīyaḥ, taṃ bodhisattva ekakṣaṇalavamuhūrtenaiva sarvamudgṛhya ekodāhāreṇaiva sarvānājñāpayet
XXbsu014_u:1681: yāvadanabhilāpyānapi lokadhātūn spharitvā yathāśayendriyādhimuktitaḥ sattvebhyo dharmaṃ deśayati
XXbsu014_u:1682: dharmasāṃkathyaṃ niṣaṇṇaśca tathāgatādhiṣṭhānasaṃpratyeṣakaḥ sakalena buddhakāryeṇa sarvasattvānāṃ pratyupasthito bhavati /
XXbsu014_u:1684: sacedekasmin vālāgraprasare yāvantyanabhilāpyeṣu lokadhātuṣu paramāṇurajāṃsi tāvantastathāgatāstāvadapramāṇaprāpteṣveva parṣanmaṇḍaleṣu dharmaṃ deśayeyuḥ /
XXbsu014_u:1685: ekaikaśca tathāgatastāvadapramāṇaprāptebhyaḥ sarvasattvebhyo nānātvato dharmaṃ deśayet, ekaikasmiṃśca sattvāśayasaṃtāne tāvadapramāṇameva dharmopasaṃhāramupasaṃharet /
XXbsu014_u:1686: yathā caikastathāgataḥ parṣanmaṇḍale tathā te sarve tathāgatāḥ /
XXbsu014_u:1687: yathā caikasmin vālāgraprasare tathā sarvasmin dharmadhātau /
XXbsu014_u:1688: tatrāsmābhistādṛśaṃ smṛtivaipulyamabhinirhartavyaṃ yathaikakṣaṇena sarvatathāgatānāṃ sakāśāddharmāvabhāsaṃ pratyeṣemahi ekarutāvyatirekāt /
XXbsu014_u:1689: yāvanti ca tāni yathāparikīrtitāni parṣanmaṇḍalāni nānānikāyadharmapravaṇaikaparipūrṇāni,
XXbsu014_u:1690: tatrāsmābhistādṛśaṃ prajñāvabhāsaviniścayapratibhānaṃ pariśodhyaṃ yadekakṣaṇena sarvasattvān paritoṣayet, kiṃ punariyatsu lokadhātuṣu
XXbsu014_u:1692: sa imāṃ sādhumatīṃ bodhisattvabhūmimanuprāpto bodhisattvo bhūyasyā mātrayā rātriṃdivamananyamanasikāraprayukto bhūtvā buddhagocarānupraviṣṭastathāgatasamavadhānaprāpto gambhīrabodhisattvavimokṣānuprāpto bhavati /
XXbsu014_u:1693: sa evaṃjñānānugato bodhisattvaḥ samāhitastathāgatadarśanaṃ na vijahāti /
XXbsu014_u:1694: ekaikāsmiṃśca kalpe 'nekān buddhān, anekāni buddhaśatāni ... anekāni buddhakoṭinayutaśatasahasrāṇi dṛṣṭvā ca satkaroti gurukaroti mānayati pūjayati /
XXbsu014_u:1698: tasya bhūyasyā mātrayā tāni kuśalamūlānyuttaptatamānyasaṃhāryāṇi bhavanti /
XXbsu014_u:1699: tadyathāpi nāma bho jinaputrāstadeva jātarūpamābharaṇīkṛtaṃ supariniṣṭhitaṃ kuśalena karmāreṇa rājñaścakravartina uttamāṅge kaṇṭhe vā ābaddhamasaṃhārya bhavati sarvakoṭṭarājānāṃ cāturdvipakānāṃ ca
XXbsu014_u:1700: sattvānāmābharaṇavikṛtaiḥ, evameva bho jinaputrā bodhisattvasya asyāṃ sādhumatyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau sthitasya tāni kuśalamūlāni mahājñānālokasuvibhaktānyuttapyante, (Dbh 54) asaṃhāryāṇi bhavanti sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhairadharabhūmisthitaiśca bodhisattvaiḥ /
XXbsu014_u:1701: tasya sā kuśalamūlābhā sattvānāṃ kleśacittagahanānyavabhāsya tata eva vyāvartate /
XXbsu014_u:1702: tadyathāpi nāma bho jinaputrā dvisāhasriko mahābrahmā sarvasmin dvisāhasrike lokadhātau gahananimnopacārānavabhāsayati, evameva bho jinaputrā bodhisattvasya asyāṃ sādhumatyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau sthitasya sā kuśalamūlābhā sattvānāṃ kleśacittagahanānyavabhāsya tata eva vyāvartate /
XXbsu014_u:1703: tasya daśabhyaḥ pāramitābhyo balapāramitā atiriktatamā bhavati, na ca pariśeṣāsu na samudācarati yathābalaṃ yathābhajamānam /
XXbsu014_u:1704: iyaṃ bhavanto jinaputrā bodhisattvasya sādhumatī nāma navamī bodhisattvabhūmiḥ ...
XXbsu014_u:1711: vajragarbho bodhisattva āha - yo 'yaṃ bhavanto jinaputrā bodhisattva
XXbsu014_u:1712: evamapramāṇajñeyavicāritayā buddhyā yāvannavamī bodhisattvabhūmiriti suvicitavicayaḥ suparipūrṇaśukladharmaḥ paryantasaṃbhāropacayopacitaḥ suparigṛhītamahāpuṇyajñānasaṃbhāraḥ mahākaruṇāvaipulyādhigataḥ lokadhātuvibhaktivaimātryakovidaḥ sattvadhātupraviṣṭagahanopacāraḥ tathāgatagocarapraveśānugatasaṃjñāmanasikāraḥ balavaiśāradyabuddhadharmādhyālambanānugataḥ sarvākārasarvajñajñānābhiṣekabhūmiprāpta ityucyate tasya khalu punarbhavanto jinaputrā evaṃjñānānugatasya bodhisattvasya abhiṣekabhūmisamāpannasya vimalo nāma samādhirāmukhībhavati /
XXbsu014_u:1723: sa tān sarvān samādhīn samāpadyate ca vyuttiṣṭhate ca, samādhikauśalyānugataśca yāvatsamādhikāryaṃ tatsarvaṃ pratyanubhavati /
XXbsu014_u:1725: yasmin samanantarābhimukhībhūte daśatrisāhasraśatasahasrāparyantapramāṇaṃ mahāratnarājapadmaṃ prādurbhavati sarvākārararatnapratyarpitaṃ sarvalokaviṣayasamatikrāntaṃ lokottarakuśalamūlasaṃbhūtaṃ māyāsvabhāvagocarapariniṣpannaṃ dharmadhātusuvyavasthitāvabhāsaṃ divyaviṣayasamatikrāntaṃ mahāvaiḍūryamaṇiratnadaṇḍamatulyacandanarājakarṇikaṃ mahāśmagarbhakesaraṃ
XXbsu014_u:1728: sa tasya sarvajñajñānaviśeṣābhiṣekavataḥ samādheḥ sahapratilambhāttasminmahāratnarājapadme niṣaṇṇaḥ saṃdṛśyate /
XXbsu014_u:1729: samanantaraniṣaṇṇaśca sa bodhisattvastasmin mahāratnarājapadme, atha yāvanti tasya mahāratnarājapadmasya mahāpadmāni parivāraḥ prādurbhūtaḥ,
XXbsu014_u:1730: tāvanto bodhisattvā daśadiglokadhātusaṃnipatitāstaṃ bodhisattvamanuparivārya teṣu mahāratnapadmeṣu niṣīdanti /
XXbsu014_u:1731: ekaikaśca teṣāṃ daśa samādhiśatasahasrāṇi samāpadyate tameva bodhisattvaṃ nirīkṣamāṇaḥ //
XXbsu014_u:1732: samanantarasamāpanne ca tasmin bodhisattve teṣu ca bodhisattveṣu
XXbsu014_u:1737: sarvasattvasukhasaṃjananaṃ ca sarvasamyaksaṃbuddhācintyapūjopasthānapravartanaṃ ca sarvatathāgataparṣanmaṇḍalavijñāpanaṃ ca bhavati /
XXbsu014_u:1738: tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bho jinaputrāstasya bodhisattvasya samanantaraniṣaṇṇasya tasmin mahāratnarājapadme
XXbsu014_u:1745: avabhāsayanti, sarvayamalaukikānāṃ sattvānāṃ duḥkhāni ca praśamayanti /
XXbsu014_u:1755: ūrṇākośāddaśaraśmyasaṃkhyeyaśatasahasrāṇi niścaranti, niścarya daśasu dikṣu sarvamārabhavanānyavabhāsya dhyāmīkṛtya abhiṣekabhūmiprāptān bodhisattvān avabhāsya tatkāyeṣvevāstaṃ gacchanti /
XXbsu014_u:1758: dharmadhātupramāṇānyākāśadhātuparyavasānāni sarvatathāgataparṣanmaṇḍalānyavabhāsya daśākāraṃ lokaṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya uparikhagapathe sthitvā mahāraśmijālamaṇḍalāni kṛtvā uttaptaprabhāsaṃ nāma mahattathāgatapūjopasthānaṃ sarvatathāgatānāmanupravartayanti /
XXbsu014_u:1759: tasya pūjopasthānasya prathamacittotpādamupādāya yāvannavamībhūmyanupravartitam tathāgatapūjopasthānaṃ tataḥ khalvapi mahāraśmijālamaṇḍalādyāvatī daśasu dikṣu niravaśeṣasarvadharmadhātvantargatā
XXbsu014_u:1762: acintyanirvāṇādhiṣṭhānādhiṣṭhitā nānāvyūhamahāratnavarṣā iva ekaikatathāgataparṣanmaṇḍale mahāmeghā ivābhipravarṣanti sma /
XXbsu014_u:1763: tāṃ ca ye sattvāḥ pūjāṃ saṃjānante, te sarve niyatā bhavantyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
XXbsu014_u:1764: evaṃrūpaṃ pūjopasthānaṃ pravartya tā raśmayaḥ punareva sarvāvanti tathāgataparṣanmaṇḍalānyavabhāsya daśākāraṃ lokaṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya teṣāṃ tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāmadhastātkramataleṣu astaṃ gacchanti /
XXbsu014_u:1765: tatasteṣāṃ tathāgatānāṃ teṣāṃ ca bodhisattvānāṃ viditaṃ bhavati - amuṣmin lokadhātuprasare evaṃcaryānugato bodhisattvo 'bhiṣekakālaprāpta iti /
XXbsu014_u:1766: tatra bho jinaputrā daśabhyo digbhyo 'paryantebhyo lokadhātuprasarebhyo
XXbsu014_u:1767: 'prameyāsaṃkhyeyāparyantā bodhisattvā yāvannavamībodhisattvabhūmipratiṣṭhitā āgatya taṃ bodhisattvamanuparivārya mahatīṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā tameva bodhisattvaṃ (Dbh 57) nirīkṣamāṇā daśa samādhiśatasahasrāṇi samāpadyante /
XXbsu014_u:1768: abhiṣekabhūmiprāptānāṃ ca bodhisattvānāṃ kāyebhyaḥ śrīvatsālaṃkārādvajrasvastikāt sarvamāraśatruvijayo nāmaikaikā mahāraśmirdaśaraśmyasaṃkhyeyaśatasahasraparivārā niścarati, niścarya daśadiśo 'vabhāsya aparyantāni prātihāryāṇi saṃdarśya tasya bodhisattvasya śrīvatsālaṃkāre vajrasvastika evāstaṃ gacchati /
XXbsu014_u:1769: samanantarādastamitāyāśca tasyā raśmyāḥ śatasahasraguṇottarā tasya bodhisattvasya balasthāmābhivṛddhiḥ prajñāyate //
XXbsu014_u:1770: atha khalu bho jinaputrāḥ sarvajñatābhijñāvatyo nāma raśmayasteṣāṃ tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāmūrṇākośebhyo niścarantyasaṃkhyeyaparivārāḥ /

XXbsu014_u:2615: ekakṣetri acalita sarvakṣetravirajā anugata jagahita śaśiriva pratibhā /

XXbsu014_u:2658: evaṃ ca dhāraṇiviśuddhisamādhiprāptā ekakṣaṇena daśabuddhasahasra dṛṣṭāḥ /

XXbsu014_u:2695: ekaromu sugatasya raśmayo niścaranti jagakleśa śāmyati /
XXbsu014_u:2701: garbhaprāpta bahukṣetrakoṭiṣu jāyamāna kvaci kṣetra dṛśyate // 8 //
XXbsu014_u:2702: niṣkramanta jagahetu nāyako budhyamāna puna bodhimuttamām /
XXbsu014_u:2704: māyakāra yatha vidyaśikṣito jīvikārtha bahukāya darśayī /
XXbsu014_u:2708: yatha svabhāvu sugatānagocarā sarvasattva tatha prāpta dharmatām /
XXbsu014_u:2710: ye tu jñāna sugatāna arthiṃke kalpakalpaparikalpavarjitam /
XXbsu014_u:2713: marukanyā jinaṃ lokya tūṣṇībhūtāḥ śame ratāḥ // 14 //
XXbsu014_u:2718: atha khalu vajragarbho bodhisattvo daśadiśaṃ vyavalokya sarvāvatīṃ parṣadaṃ vyavalokya dharmadhātuṃ ca vyavalokayan sarvajñatācittotpādaṃ ca saṃvarṇayan bodhisattvaviṣayamādarśayan caryābalaṃ pariśodhayan sarvākārajñatāsaṃgrahamanuvyāharan sarvalokamalamapakarṣayan sarvajñajñānamupasaṃharan acintyajñānaniryūhamādarśayan bodhisattvaguṇān prabhāvayan evameva bhūmyarthaṃ prarūpayamāṇo buddhānubhāvena tasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
XXbsu014_u:2722: khilamanavidhutānāṃ mārgajñāne sthitānāṃ śṛṇuta cariviśeṣān bodhisattvāna śreṣṭhān // 17 //
XXbsu014_u:2723: kuśalaśatasahasraṃ saṃciyā kalpakoṭyā buddhaśatasahasrān pūjayitvā maharṣīn /
XXbsu014_u:2727: yāva jina triyadhvā pūjanārthāya pūjaṃ khagapathapariṇāmaṃ śodhanaṃ sarvakṣetram /
XXbsu014_u:2728: samyaganugatārthe yāvatā sarvadharmān mokṣa jagata arthe jāyate bodhicittam // 20 //
XXbsu014_u:2735: pracalitaśubhakāryā dhīravīryotsahā ye nikhilajanahitārthe prodyayāmāna siṃhāḥ /
XXbsu014_u:2737: avirataguṇasādhyā nirjitakleśasaṃghā jhaṭiti manasi teṣāṃ jāyate bodhicittam // 24 //
XXbsu014_u:2739: śamasukhaniratā ye tyaktasaṃsārasaṅgā jhaṭiti manasi teṣāṃ jāyate bodhicittam // 25//
XXbsu014_u:2741: jinapadaśaraṇasthā labdhatattvārthakā ye sapadi manasi teṣāṃ jāyate bodhicittam // 26 //
XXbsu014_u:2743: sugataguṇasamīhā ye ca puṇyānurāgāḥ sapadi manasi teṣāṃ jāyate bodhicittam
XXbsu014_u:2746: avirataśubhakarmaprodyatā bodhisattvāḥ sapadi manasi teṣāṃ jāyate bodhicittam // 28 //
XXbsu014_u:2748: anugataśubhamārgā labdhadharmārthakāmā jhaṭiti manasi teṣāṃ jāyate bodhicittam // 29 //
XXbsu014_u:2749: iti gaṇitaguṇāṃśā bodhicaryāścarantu jinapadapraṇidhānāḥ satsamṛddhiṃ labhantu /
XXbsu014_u:2750: triguṇapariviśuddhā bodhicittaṃ labhantu triśaraṇapariśuddhā bodhisattvā bhavantu // 30 //
XXbsu014_u:2823: dharmameghāṃ tataḥ prāpto maheśvaro bhavet kṛtī // 65 //
XXbsu014_u:2832: tathā bodhiṃ śivāṃ prāpya caturmārān vijitya ca /
XXbsu014_u:2839: etāstāḥ khalu punarbho jinaputrā daśa bodhisattvabhūmayaḥ samāsato nirdiṣṭāḥ sarvākāravaropetasarvajñajñānānugatā draṣṭavyāḥ /
XXbsu014_u:2840: tasyāṃ velāyāmayaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātuḥ ṣaḍvikāraṃ prākampat /
XXbsu014_u:2844: atha tasmin samaye bhagavāṃstān vimukticandrapramukhān sarvān bodhisattvānāmantrya evamādiśat - imāmahaṃ mārṣā asaṃkhyeyakalpakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrasamudānītāmanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ yuṣmākaṃ haste parindāmi anuparindāmi paramayā parindanayā /
XXbsu014_u:2845: tadyūyaṃ sarve svayaṃ caivamimaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ dhārayata, parebhyaśca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayata
XXbsu014_u:2847: dharmaparyāyasya varṇaṃ bhāṣate, naivāsya dharmaparyāyasya varṇaparyanto
XXbsu014_u:2850: tathāgataśīlasamādhiprajñāvimuktijñānadarśanamapramāṇamaparyantam, evameva mārṣā ya imaṃ dharmaparyāyamudgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati likhiṣyati likhāpayiṣyati paryavāpsyati pravartayiṣyati, parṣanmadhye ca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayiṣyati - anena cittena kathamamī sattvā evamudāradharmasya lābhinaḥ syuriti śraddhayā satkṛtya śrāvayiṣyanti śroṣyanti ca yoniśo manasi bhāvayiṣyanti ca /
XXbsu014_u:2851: pustakalikhitaṃ kṛtvā gṛhe dhārayiṣyati satkariṣyati gurukariṣyati mānayiṣyati pūjayiṣyati
XXbsu014_u:2852: amātsaryacittatayā asya dharmaparyāyasya varṇaṃ bhāṣitvā likhanāya vācanāya svādhyayanāya pūjanāya darśanāya dāsyati, teṣāmapi nāsti puṇyaparyantaḥ //
XXbsu014_u:2853: atha khalu bhagavānasyaiva dharmaparyāyasya bhūyasyā mātrayā anuparindanārthaṃ tasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
XXbsu014_u:2854: sattvā dṛṣṭā ye mayā buddhadṛṣṭyā te 'rhantaḥ syuḥ śāriputreṇa tulyāḥ /
XXbsu014_u:2856: pratyekabuddhāya tu yaśca pūjāṃ kuryādahorātramapi prahṛṣṭaḥ /
XXbsu014_u:2858: sarve 'pi pratyekajinā yadi syustān pūjayet kaścidihāpramattaḥ /
XXbsu014_u:2861: ekasya yaścaiva tathāgatasya kuryāt praṇāmamapi caikavāram /
XXbsu014_u:2862: prasannacitto 'tha vadennamo 'rhan tasmādidaṃ śreṣṭhataraṃ ca puṇyam // 4
XXbsu014_u:2863: buddhā bhaveyuryadi sarvasattvāstān pūjayet yaśca yathaiva pūrvam /
XXbsu014_u:2864: divyaiśca puṣpairatha mānuṣaiśca kalpānanekān bahubhiḥ prakāraiḥ // 5 //
XXbsu014_u:2865: yaścaiva saddharmavilopakāle tyaktvā svakāyaṃ ca tathātmajīvam /
XXbsu014_u:2866: dadyādahorātramidaṃ hi sūtraṃ viśiṣyate puṇyamidaṃ hi tasmāt // 6 //
XXbsu014_u:2868: dṛḍhaṃ samutpādya sa bodhicittam idaṃ sadā sūtravaraṃ dadātu // 7 //
XXbsu014_u:2870: gṛhe sthitastasya tathāgataḥ sa tiṣṭhedidaṃ yatra hi sūtraratnam // 8 //
XXbsu014_u:2871: prabhāṃ sa prāpnoti śubhāmanantām ekaṃ padaṃ vādi śatīhayaśca /
XXbsu014_u:2872: na vyañjanād grasyati nāpi cārthād dadāti yaḥ sūtramidaṃ parebhyaḥ // 9 //
XXbsu014_u:2873: anuttarāsau naranāyakānāṃ sattvo na kaścit sadṛśo 'sya vidyate /
XXbsu014_u:2874: bhavetsamudreṇa samaśca so 'kṣayaḥ śrutvā hi yo dharmamimaṃ prapadyate //

XXbsu014_u:2877: idam avocad bhagavān āttamanās te vimukticandrapūrvaṃgamā bodhisattvagaṇā vaśavartidevarājapramukhāḥ sarvadevādhipatīśvarāś ca mahānandapūrvaṃgamā sarvamahāśrāvakagaṇāḥ sadevamānuṣāsuragandharvaś ca lokaḥ sā sarvāvatī parṣad bhagavato vajragarbhasya bhāṣitam abhyanandann iti //
XXbsu014_u:2879: iti śrībodhisattvacaryāprasthāno daśabhūmīśvaro nāma mahāyānasūtraratnarājaḥ samāptaḥ //
XXbsu014_u:2880: ye dharmā hetuprabhavā hetun teṣāṃ tathāgato hy avadat /
XXbsu014_u:2881: teṣāṃ ca yo nirodho evaṃ vādī mahāśramaṇaḥ //
